data.eml:eml: Typhlocharis Dieck, 1869 (Coleoptera: Carabidae, Anillini): a new species from the Iberian Peninsula, with notes about its relationships and the evolution of the diecki species group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Andújar, Carmelo, Lencina, José Luís, Serrano, José (2008): Typhlocharis Dieck, 1869 (Coleoptera: Carabidae, Anillini): a new species from the Iberian Peninsula, with notes about its relationships and the evolution of the diecki species group. Zootaxa 1842: 35-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183212
